views.markdown:
Castro - A fresh face for the iOS Volume HUD on iOS 10.

Castro replaces the (pre)historic volume HUD with a new style that's more in-line with the design trends of modern iOS. Check out the screenshots

It features unique indicators, an adaptive Dark-Mode compatible with Apple's NightShift & the tweak Noctis, and a new Media indicator that keeps you informed on what's playing wherever you need it

Grab a copy of this unique package from BigBoss & support the continued development!

This has been built with RTL support in-mind. If you use those language types, please send some feedback!


Configure options from Settings.

Castro - 1.0.2

-Fixed an issue for users of the tweak YouTube++


Castro - 1.0.1
-Fixes for YouTube App
-Fixed an issue where tinted header colours might not adapt properly
